pli-tv-bu-vb-pc7:4.1.15: “Is present” is not actually found in the Pali, but it is implied.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc7:4.3.6: Sp 2.66: Sampadānatthe vā etaṁ bhummavacanaṁ. Tassā desetīti attho, “Or this locative case is in the meaning of the dative. The meaning is: he teaches her.” In other words, the locative tasmiṁ should be read as a dative.
